text.section: A person who owns, possesses, or has custody of a domestic animal may not drop or leave the animal on a road, in a public place, or on private property with the intent to abandon the animal.
A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $100.
